statements: SELECT * FROM HealthcareEquity;
SELECT community_name, healthcare_resources_allocated FROM HealthcareEquity;
SELECT population_size, healthcare_trends_analysis FROM HealthcareEquity;
SELECT * FROM HealthcareEquity WHERE healthcare_resources_allocated > 500;
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM HealthcareEquity WHERE healthcare_trends_analysis LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM HealthcareEquity WHERE healthcare_resources_allocated > 100 ORDER BY community_name DESC;
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM HealthcareEquity WHERE healthcare_resources_allocated BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT id, healthcare_trends_analysis FROM HealthcareEquity WHERE population_size < 500 ORDER BY healthcare_resources_allocated ASC;
SELECT community_name, healthcare_trends_analysis FROM HealthcareEquity WHERE population_size > 1000 AND healthcare_resources_allocated < 300;
SELECT id, community_name, population_size FROM HealthcareEquity WHERE healthcare_trends_analysis LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, type, capacity FROM healthcare_facilities ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT location, facility_name FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE type='Hospital';
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, facility_name, type, location FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE type = 'Hospital';
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_facilities, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM healthcare_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM healthcare_facilities ORDER BY location DESC, capacity ASC;
SELECT AVG(healthcare_access_score) AS avg_access_score, AVG(resource_allocation_score) AS avg_resource_score FROM community_health_metrics;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources;
SELECT community_id, resource_type, quantity FROM healthcare_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Doctor';
SELECT community_name, region, population FROM communities WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT trend_id, resource_type, trend_date, average_quantity FROM resource_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources WHERE allocation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY allocation_date DESC
SELECT community_name, population FROM communities WHERE region='East'
SELECT * FROM resource_trends ORDER BY average_quantity ASC, trend_date DESC
SELECT community_name, region, population FROM communities WHERE population > 5000 AND region='West'
SELECT resource_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM healthcare_resources GROUP BY resource_type HAVING total_quantity > 1000
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, location FROM Healthcare_Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT patient_name, condition FROM Patients WHERE condition = 'Diabetes';
SELECT resource_name, type, location FROM Healthcare_Resources ORDER BY type, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE expertise = 'Cardiology';
SELECT resource_name, type, location FROM Healthcare_Resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT community_name, health_status FROM Community_Health_Status WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_location FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_rating DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctor WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_id FROM Appointment WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, quantity FROM HealthcareResource WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_rating DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM Doctor JOIN Hospital ON Doctor.hospital_id = Hospital.hospital_id;
SELECT * FROM Appointment JOIN Patient ON Appointment.patient_id = Patient.patient_id WHERE Patient.patient_status = 'Active';
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Appointment JOIN Doctor ON Appointment.doctor_id = Doctor.doctor_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
